title: Build Drag-and-Drop React Board
description: In this challenge we will develop a react drag and drop similar to JIRA board without any external library.

meta.title: React Drag and Drop Tutorial | JIRA Board Clone
meta.description: Learn how to build a React drag and drop functionality similar to JIRA board without any external library. Develop a dynamic and interactive user interface.
meta.keywords: React, Drag and Drop, JIRA Board, User Interface, Dynamic Web Application
